data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jennings, John T., Krogmann, Lars, Mew, Steven L. (2012): Hyptia deansi sp. nov., the first record of Evaniidae (Hymenoptera) from Mexican amber. Zootaxa 3349: 63-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.209005
